messages.title: Dear Voter,
messages.content: Every vote for UKIP strengthens the British Govt's hand in the forthcoming EU negotiations in exactly the same way as a Conservative vote does. Many Brexiteers will feel uncomfortable switching their votes to the Tories. But voting UKIP sends precisely the same message to Brussels. Married with children, I was raised in a Council prefab. My father and grandfathers laboured in the Ayrshire coalfields. My working life was spent in the Civil Service and I have served 4 years as a UKIP County Councillor.

Many Brexiteers will feel uncomfortable switching their votes to the Tories. But voting UKIP sends precisely the same message to Brussels.
